11#ifndef MODULES_AUDIO_PROCESSING_AEC3_ADAPTIVE_FIR_FILTER_H_
12#define MODULES_AUDIO_PROCESSING_AEC3_ADAPTIVE_FIR_FILTER_H_
13
14#include <stddef.h>
15
16#include <array>
17#include <vector>
18
19#include "api/array_view.h"
20#include "modules/audio_processing/aec3/aec3_common.h"
21#include "modules/audio_processing/aec3/aec3_fft.h"
22#include "modules/audio_processing/aec3/fft_data.h"
23#include "modules/audio_processing/aec3/render_buffer.h"
24#include "modules/audio_processing/logging/apm_data_dumper.h"
25#include "rtc_base/system/arch.h"
26
27namespace webrtc {
28namespace aec3 {
29// Computes and stores the frequency response of the filter.
30void ComputeFrequencyResponse(
31 size_t num_partitions,
32 const std::vector<std::vector<FftData>>& H,
33 std::vector<std::array<float, kFftLengthBy2Plus1>>* H2);
34#if defined(WEBRTC_HAS_NEON)
35void ComputeFrequencyResponse_Neon(
36 size_t num_partitions,
37 const std::vector<std::vector<FftData>>& H,
38 std::vector<std::array<float, kFftLengthBy2Plus1>>* H2);
39#endif
40#if defined(WEBRTC_ARCH_X86_FAMILY)
41void ComputeFrequencyResponse_Sse2(
42 size_t num_partitions,
43 const std::vector<std::vector<FftData>>& H,
44 std::vector<std::array<float, kFftLengthBy2Plus1>>* H2);
45
46void ComputeFrequencyResponse_Avx2(
47 size_t num_partitions,
48 const std::vector<std::vector<FftData>>& H,
49 std::vector<std::array<float, kFftLengthBy2Plus1>>* H2);
50#endif
51
52// Adapts the filter partitions.
53void AdaptPartitions(const RenderBuffer& render_buffer,
54 const FftData& G,
55 size_t num_partitions,
56 std::vector<std::vector<FftData>>* H);
57#if defined(WEBRTC_HAS_NEON)
58void AdaptPartitions_Neon(const RenderBuffer& render_buffer,
59 const FftData& G,
60 size_t num_partitions,
61 std::vector<std::vector<FftData>>* H);
62#endif
63#if defined(WEBRTC_ARCH_X86_FAMILY)
64void AdaptPartitions_Sse2(const RenderBuffer& render_buffer,
65 const FftData& G,
66 size_t num_partitions,
67 std::vector<std::vector<FftData>>* H);
68
69void AdaptPartitions_Avx2(const RenderBuffer& render_buffer,
70 const FftData& G,
71 size_t num_partitions,
72 std::vector<std::vector<FftData>>* H);
73#endif
74
75// Produces the filter output.
76void ApplyFilter(const RenderBuffer& render_buffer,
77 size_t num_partitions,
78 const std::vector<std::vector<FftData>>& H,
79 FftData* S);
80#if defined(WEBRTC_HAS_NEON)
81void ApplyFilter_Neon(const RenderBuffer& render_buffer,
82 size_t num_partitions,
83 const std::vector<std::vector<FftData>>& H,
84 FftData* S);
85#endif
86#if defined(WEBRTC_ARCH_X86_FAMILY)
87void ApplyFilter_Sse2(const RenderBuffer& render_buffer,
88 size_t num_partitions,
89 const std::vector<std::vector<FftData>>& H,
90 FftData* S);
91
92void ApplyFilter_Avx2(const RenderBuffer& render_buffer,
93 size_t num_partitions,
94 const std::vector<std::vector<FftData>>& H,
95 FftData* S);
96#endif
97
98} // namespace aec3
99
100// Provides a frequency domain adaptive filter functionality.
101class AdaptiveFirFilter {
102 public:
103 AdaptiveFirFilter(size_t max_size_partitions,
104 size_t initial_size_partitions,
105 size_t size_change_duration_blocks,
106 size_t num_render_channels,
107 Aec3Optimization optimization,
108 ApmDataDumper* data_dumper);
109
110 ~AdaptiveFirFilter();
111
112 AdaptiveFirFilter(const AdaptiveFirFilter&) = delete;
113 AdaptiveFirFilter& operator=(const AdaptiveFirFilter&) = delete;
114
115 // Produces the output of the filter.
116 void Filter(const RenderBuffer& render_buffer, FftData* S) const;
117
118 // Adapts the filter and updates an externally stored impulse response
119 // estimate.
120 void Adapt(const RenderBuffer& render_buffer,
121 const FftData& G,
122 std::vector<float>* impulse_response);
123
124 // Adapts the filter.
125 void Adapt(const RenderBuffer& render_buffer, const FftData& G);
126
127 // Receives reports that known echo path changes have occured and adjusts
128 // the filter adaptation accordingly.
129 void HandleEchoPathChange();
130
131 // Returns the filter size.
132 size_t SizePartitions() const { return current_size_partitions_; }
133
134 // Sets the filter size.
135 void SetSizePartitions(size_t size, bool immediate_effect);
136
137 // Computes the frequency responses for the filter partitions.
138 void ComputeFrequencyResponse(
139 std::vector<std::array<float, kFftLengthBy2Plus1>>* H2) const;
140
141 // Returns the maximum number of partitions for the filter.
142 size_t max_filter_size_partitions() const { return max_size_partitions_; }
143
144 void DumpFilter(const char* name_frequency_domain) {
145 for (size_t p = 0; p < max_size_partitions_; ++p) {
146 data_dumper_->DumpRaw(name_frequency_domain, H_[p][0].re);
147 data_dumper_->DumpRaw(name_frequency_domain, H_[p][0].im);
148 }
149 }
150
151 // Scale the filter impulse response and spectrum by a factor.
152 void ScaleFilter(float factor);
153
154 // Set the filter coefficients.
155 void SetFilter(size_t num_partitions,
156 const std::vector<std::vector<FftData>>& H);
157
158 // Gets the filter coefficients.
159 const std::vector<std::vector<FftData>>& GetFilter() const { return H_; }
160
161 private:
162 // Adapts the filter and updates the filter size.
163 void AdaptAndUpdateSize(const RenderBuffer& render_buffer, const FftData& G);
164
165 // Constrain the filter partitions in a cyclic manner.
166 void Constrain();
167 // Constrains the filter in a cyclic manner and updates the corresponding
168 // values in the supplied impulse response.
169 void ConstrainAndUpdateImpulseResponse(std::vector<float>* impulse_response);
170
171 // Gradually Updates the current filter size towards the target size.
172 void UpdateSize();
173
174 ApmDataDumper* const data_dumper_;
175 const Aec3Fft fft_;
176 const Aec3Optimization optimization_;
177 const size_t num_render_channels_;
178 const size_t max_size_partitions_;
179 const int size_change_duration_blocks_;
180 float one_by_size_change_duration_blocks_;
181 size_t current_size_partitions_;
182 size_t target_size_partitions_;
183 size_t old_target_size_partitions_;
184 int size_change_counter_ = 0;
185 std::vector<std::vector<FftData>> H_;
186 size_t partition_to_constrain_ = 0;
187};
188
189} // namespace webrtc
190
191#endif // MODULES_AUDIO_PROCESSING_AEC3_ADAPTIVE_FIR_FILTER_H_
192
